posts.post_content:
PSA or SCG 1.5 - 2.5 with nice eye appeal.  [url]toddwalk@gmail.com[/url] or PM

Thanks!

This was my descript. when I listed it in a group.
(I know it is not slabbed but is a nice card.)

"1910 T206 Collins (port.)
Raw
Front, corner crease top left; light horizontal crease below top uniform button; light surface crease across the "A"; scan shows "cleanness" of the rest.
Back, small stain above "Cigarette"; tiny paper loss top right; scan shows "cleanness" of the rest.
$300 or b/o"

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1364&pictureid=32615[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1364&pictureid=32616[/IMG]

Ben
"I love baseball history backstory; especially when it involves cards."
